lead_paragraph: As women have come forward to accuse Donald Trump of groping them without their consent, the accusations have raised interest in the legal rules about such contact.

headline.print_headline: State Laws Address Groping Accusations, but Prosecutions and Lawsuits Are Rare
headline.main: Donald Trump Has Been Accused of Groping. But What Does the Law Say?

snippet: As women have come forward to accuse Donald Trump of groping them without their consent, the accusations have raised interest in the legal rules about such contact....
abstract: Accusations against Donald J Trump from women who say he groped them without their permission raise interest about legality of his alleged actions; Q&A  touches on differences between sexual assault and rape, whether or not lawsuits could be filed against Trump for his alleged actions, and how criminal laws in different states treat groping.
